page.title: 08Housing 1
page.content: In our block the housing is generally on private housing estates. There are three private housing estates{Pine Hills}about{5 to 10 years {old,Galley Hill}estate{10 years old and{Hutton Meadows}about{20 years old. There are all types of houses ranging from{semi-detatched,detatched}and {bungalows}on these three estates,some are large executive houses.The general materials used to build these houses were{bricks}and{tiles.}All are owner occupied. There are several{farms}in the area namely{Hutton Home Farm,Galley Hill {Farm,Snow Hill Farm,Lowcross Farm, {Spite Hall Farm,Bousdale Farm,Barnaby {Side Farm,Hemble Hill Farm and East {Upsall Farm.}They are{built}of{stone and{slate}or{pan tiles.
